author: wsmoak
msg: Checking in final changes for version 1.  The 'mvn deploy' command uses the <repository> element.  This will have to be overridden in the struts-action-parent pom to avoid releasing test builds to the distribution repository.

msg: cleaning up some TODO comments and removing unused method fixPageLink()

msg: MEAR-24: earName can now be set by the end-user.

msg: Switch to version 1 in preparation for releasing the struts-parent pom.
